pages.text: 暴食者是一種獨特的生物，具有與附魔相關的有趣能力。

The Glutton is a complex mob that is able to consume items thrown into its mouth and store the enchantments. It can then apply those enchantments to a new enchantable item thrown in, given that the item has no enchantments to begin with. Any unenchantable items will be permanently consumed, like a trash can. It is also able to get enchantments one level higher than the max when 2 max level enchants are combined. It can not go any higher than 1 above max, and only works on enchantments that have levels higher than 1.
它可以結合通常無法像是無限和修補等不相容的附魔，但在任何保護下都拒絕這樣做。一旦和物品在暴食者中使用，它就不能再與暴食者一起使用，但仍然可以在鐵砧或砂輪中進行修改。

Taking damage from the Glutton will cause 1 random enchanted item in your inventory to lose an enchantment level (if enabled in config). If the enchantment is already at minimum level, it will remove the enchantment entirely.$(br2)Drops: Bottle o' Enchanting, $(l:items/void_heart)Void Heart$(/l)
